subtitle:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,900
Tē-it khò, Siaⁿ-bó: Cha̍p-peh jī.
Lesson One, Initials: Eighteen Characters.

2
00:00:04,900 --> 00:00:08,200
Lán ùi thán-hoâiⁿ ê seng tòe góa liām chi̍t piàn.
Let's follow the horizontal rows and read with me once first.

3
00:00:08,200 --> 00:00:15,500
p, ph, b, m.

4
00:00:15,500 --> 00:00:21,500
t, th, l, n.

5
00:00:21,500 --> 00:00:29,200
k, kh, g, ng, h.

6
00:00:29,200 --> 00:00:35,500
ch, chh, j, s.

7
00:00:35,500 --> 00:00:38,500
Lêng-siaⁿ-bó.
Zero Initial.

8
00:00:38,500 --> 00:00:44,500
Lêng-siaⁿ-bó ê ì-sù, tiō-sī kóng bô siaⁿ-bó ê ì-sù.
The meaning of "Zero Initial" is that there is no initial consonant.

9
00:00:44,500 --> 00:00:50,000
Lán khòaⁿ hun-sek. Lán kā hun-chò sì pō͘-hūn.
Let's look at the analysis. We divide it into four parts.

10
00:00:50,000 --> 00:00:56,500
Tē-it pō͘-hūn kap tē-jī pō͘-hūn, sī hun bô-sàng-khùi kap ū-sàng-khùi ê hun-pia̍t.
Parts 1 and 2 distinguish between non-aspirated and aspirated sounds.

11
00:00:56,500 --> 00:01:03,500
Tī chia, lí ē-tàng khòaⁿ bô-sàng-khùi ê pō͘-hūn.
Here, you can see the non-aspirated part.

12
00:01:03,500 --> 00:01:07,500
lán tò-pêng téng liām tò lo̍h-lâi
Let's read down from the left side.

13
00:01:07,500 --> 00:01:12,500
p, t, k, ch, chit sì im.
p, t, k, ch, these four sounds.

14
00:01:12,500 --> 00:01:19,200
Chit sì im āu-piah, lán kā ke chi̍t-ê "h", i tō piàn-chò ū-sàng-khùi.
Behind these four sounds, if we add an "h", they become aspirated.

15
00:01:19,200 --> 00:01:23,500
Lán khòaⁿ tē-jī choā.
Let's look at the second column.

16
00:01:23,500 --> 00:01:28,500
ph, th, kh, chh.

17
00:01:28,500 --> 00:01:34,500
Tē-it choā kap tē-jī choā, lán chò-hóe lâi liām khòaⁿ-māi leh,
Column one and column two, let's read them together,

18
00:01:34,500 --> 00:01:39,500
ū-sàng-khùi kap bô-sàng-khùi ê hun-pia̍t tī tó-ūi.
to see where the distinction between aspirated and non-aspirated lies.

19
00:01:39,500 --> 00:01:42,500
p, ph

20
00:01:42,500 --> 00:01:45,500
t, th

21
00:01:45,500 --> 00:01:48,500
k, kh

22
00:01:48,500 --> 00:01:51,500
ch, chh

23
00:01:51,500 --> 00:01:56,500
Koh-lâi khòaⁿ tē saⁿ choā kap tē sì choā.
Next, let's look at the third column and fourth column.

24
00:01:56,500 --> 00:02:02,500
Tē saⁿ choā sī bô-phīⁿ-im, tē sì choā ū-phīⁿ-im.
The third column is non-nasal, the fourth column is nasal.

25
00:02:02,500 --> 00:02:08,000
Ū-phīⁿ-im ê pō͘-hūn, lí bān-it nā hoat bē chhut-lâi
For the nasal part, if you happen to be unable to pronounce it,

26
00:02:08,000 --> 00:02:14,000
Lí chiàu tē saⁿ choā bô-phīⁿ-im án-ne liām
you can follow the non-nasal pronunciation of the third column,

27
00:02:14,000 --> 00:02:19,500
phīⁿ-khang sió kā tē--leh, i tō piàn-chò ū-phīⁿ-im eh
and slightly press your nose, and it will become a nasal sound.

28
00:02:19,500 --> 00:02:22,500
Lán lâi khòaⁿ tē saⁿ choā. b.
Let's look at the third column (row 1). b.

29
00:02:22,500 --> 00:02:26,500
Tē sì choā sī m.
The fourth column (row 1)is m.

30
00:02:26,500 --> 00:02:30,500
tē saⁿ choā. l.
Third column (row 2), l.

31
00:02:30,500 --> 00:02:34,500
Tē sì choā sī n.
The fourth column (row 2) is n.

32
00:02:34,500 --> 00:02:38,500
tē saⁿ choā. g.
Third column (row 3). g.

33
00:02:38,500 --> 00:02:42,500
Tē sì choā sī ng.
The fourth column (row 3) is ng.

34
00:02:42,500 --> 00:02:45,500
Koh-lâi sī j
Next is j.

35
00:02:45,500 --> 00:02:50,000
lâi, Góa liām chi̍t piàn: b, m.
Come, I will read it once: b, m.

36
00:02:50,000 --> 00:02:59,000
l, n, g, ng, j

37
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:04,500
Chhun--ê iáu nn̄g jī, sī h kap s.
The remaining two characters are h and s.

38
00:03:04,500 --> 00:03:10,500
Lóng-chóng cha̍p-peh im. Khàu-tiāu lêng-siaⁿ-bó, chhun cha̍p-chhit im.
There are eighteen sounds in total. Subtracting the zero initial, seventeen remain.

39
00:03:10,500 --> 00:03:14,500
Siaⁿ-bó pún-lâi sī bô-siaⁿ.
Initials originally have no sound.

40
00:03:14,500 --> 00:03:22,500
Á bô-siaⁿ chin pháiⁿ kà, só͘-í su-iàu ūn-bó lâi hoat-siaⁿ, án-ne ta̍k-ke chiah thiaⁿ ū.
And no sound is difficult to teach, so vowels are needed to vocalize.

41
00:03:22,500 --> 00:03:29,000
Lán chit-má kā siaⁿ-bó āu-piah kā ke chi̍t jī "a".
Now, let's add the letter "a" behind the initials.

42
00:03:29,000 --> 00:03:36,000
Lán thàn-ti̍t, tùi tē it choā, tē jī choā, tē saⁿ choā,
We follow vertically, from the 1st, 2nd, 3rd columns,

43
00:03:36,000 --> 00:03:40,000
tē sì choā, tē gō͘ choā, sūn-sī lâi liām.
4th and 5th columns, reading in order.

44
00:03:40,000 --> 00:03:48,000
pa, ta, ka, cha, a.

45
00:03:48,000 --> 00:03:56,000
pha, tha, kha, chha

46
00:03:56,000 --> 00:04:03,000
ba, la, ga, ja

47
00:04:03,000 --> 00:04:12,000
ma, na, nga, ha, sa

48
00:04:12,000 --> 00:04:18,000
bô sàng-khùi, kap ū sàng-khùi hun-pia̍t.
Distinction between non-aspirated and aspirated.

49
00:04:18,000 --> 00:04:23,000
tē 1 chōa kap tē 2 chōa.
Column 1 and Column 2.

50
00:04:23,000 --> 00:04:28,000
pa, pha, ta, tha

51
00:04:28,000 --> 00:04:34,000
ka, kha, cha, chha

52
00:04:34,000 --> 00:04:40,000
tē 3 chōa, tē 4 chōa.
Column 3 and Column 4.

53
00:04:40,000 --> 00:04:44,000
bô phīⁿ-im, kap ū phīⁿ-im.
Non-nasal and nasal.

54
00:04:44,000 --> 00:04:49,000
ba, ma, la, na


55
00:04:49,000 --> 00:04:54,000
ga, nga, ja.
ga, nga, ja.

56
00:04:54,000 --> 00:05:00,000
chòe-āu, ha, sa.
Finally, ha, sa.

57
00:05:00,000 --> 00:05:13,000
Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ke ūn-bó "e".
Add the vowel "e" after the initial.

58
00:05:13,000 --> 00:05:22,000
tē 1 chōa, tē 2 chōa, chò-hóe liām.
Horizontally, column 1 and Column 2, read together.

59
00:05:22,000 --> 00:05:28,000
pe, phe, te, the

60
00:05:28,000 --> 00:05:35,000
ke, khe, che, chhe, e

61
00:05:35,000 --> 00:05:43,000
tē 3 chōa, tē 4 chōa, chò-hóe liām.
Column 3 and Column 4, read together.

62
00:05:43,000 --> 00:05:51,000
be, me, le, ne

63
00:05:51,000 --> 00:06:10,000
ge, nge, je, he, se

64
00:06:10,000 --> 00:06:18,000
Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ūn-bó "i".
Add the vowel "i" after the initial.

65
00:06:18,000 --> 00:06:28,000
pi, phi, ti, thi, ki, khi

66
00:06:28,000 --> 00:06:38,000
chi, chhi, i, bi, mi, li, ni.

67
00:06:38,000 --> 00:06:54,000
gi, ngi, ji, hi, si

68
00:06:54,000 --> 00:07:07,000
Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ūn-bó "o͘ ". Chù-ì chit-ê "o͘ ", chiàⁿ-chhiú-pêng bīn-téng ke chi̍t tiám.
Add vowel "o͘ ". Note this "o͘ ", a dot is added on the top right.

69
00:07:07,000 --> 00:07:15,000
po͘, pho͘, to͘, tho͘, ko͘, kho͘

70
00:07:15,000 --> 00:07:25,000
cho͘, chho͘, o͘, bo͘, mo͘

71
00:07:25,000 --> 00:07:35,000
lo͘, no͘, go͘, ngo͘

72
00:07:35,000 --> 00:07:46,000
jo͘, ho͘, so͘

73
00:07:46,000 --> 00:07:53,000
Ke "u".
Add "u".

74
00:07:53,000 --> 00:08:00,000
pu, phu, tu, thu

75
00:08:00,000 --> 00:08:08,000
ku, khu, chu, chhu, u

76
00:08:08,000 --> 00:08:15,000
bu, mu, lu, nu.

77
00:08:15,000 --> 00:08:23,000
gu, ngu, ju, hu, su

78
00:08:23,000 --> 00:08:32,000
ke "o".
Add "o".

79
00:08:32,000 --> 00:08:42,000
po, pho, to, tho

80
00:08:42,000 --> 00:08:52,000
ko, kho, cho, chho, o

81
00:08:52,000 --> 00:09:00,000
bo, mo, lo, no, go, ngo

82
00:09:00,000 --> 00:09:06,000
jo, ho, so
